overview:
Ken, Trulia’s Head of Communications, has more than fifteen years of public relations and corporate communications experience. Ken is one of Trulia’s spokespeople and has appeared in national media outlets such as The Wall Street Journal, Forbes, TIME and on NPR. Ken has also been a featured speaker at events across the country including SXSW and Social Media Week. Prior to working at Trulia, Ken spent twelve years at PR agencies in Boston, NYC and San Francisco. During that time, he represented tech and consumer brands like IBM, Sun, FujiFilm and launched start-ups like Become.com.

Ken earned a B.S. in Business Communications from Bentley University.
